title: Overseas Regulators Act 2012 (No. 40 of 2012), having consulted with the
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as 

the Credit Union Fund 

(Stabilisation) Levy Regulations 2022. 

Definitions
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited credit union fund (stabilisation) levy regulation 2022 definition

title: Overseas Regulators Act 2012 (No. 40 of 2012), having consulted with the
heading: In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations – 

“Act of 2012” means the Credit Union and Co-operation with Overseas 
Regulators Act 2012 (No. 40 of 2012); 

“Credit Union Fund” means the fund established under section 57 of the Act of 
2012; 

“credit union levy” means the contribution to the Credit Union Fund, by a 
credit union, referred to in section 59(3) of the Act of 2012; 

“levy period” means the period beginning on 1 October 2022 and ending on 30 
September 2023; 

“Minister” means the Minister for Finance; 

“Registrar of Credit Unions” means the Registrar of Credit Unions appointed 
under section 33X (inserted by section 26 of the Central Bank and Financial 
Services Authority of Ireland Act 2003 (No. 12 of 2003)) of the Central Bank 
Act 1942 (No. 22 of 1942); 

“total assets of the credit union” means - 

(a) 

the total assets reported by that credit union in the balance sheet 
of that credit union forming part of the quarterly prudential 
return made to the Registrar of Credit Unions in respect of the 
reporting date of 30 September 2022, or 

(b) where a credit union has not reported the quarterly prudential 
return in respect of that reporting date, the total assets reported 
by that credit union in the balance sheet of that credit union 
forming part of the quarterly prudential return made to the 
Registrar of Credit Unions in respect of the reporting date of 30 
June 2022. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 27th September, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Application of regulations
text_norm: 2 regulation - act 2012 mean credit union co-operation overseas regulator act 2012 (no 40 2012) credit union fund mean fund established section 57 act 2012 credit union levy mean contribution credit union fund credit union referred section 59(3) act 2012 levy period mean period beginning 1 october 2022 ending 30 september 2023 minister mean minister finance registrar credit union mean registrar credit union appointed section 33x (inserted section 26 central bank financial service authority ireland act 2003 (no 12 2003)) central bank act 1942 (no 22 1942) total asset credit union mean - (a) total asset reported credit union balance sheet credit union forming part quarterly prudential return made registrar credit union respect reporting date 30 september 2022 (b) credit union reported quarterly prudential return respect reporting date total asset reported credit union balance sheet credit union forming part quarterly prudential return made registrar credit union respect reporting date 30 june 2022 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 27th september 2022 application regulation

title: Overseas Regulators Act 2012 (No. 40 of 2012), having consulted with the
heading: 3. These Regulations apply to every credit union that is a credit union on 1
text_raw:
3. These Regulations apply to every credit union that is a credit union on 1 

[476] 3 

January 2023.

text_norm: 3 regulation apply every credit union credit union 1 476 3 january 2023 rate levy

title: Overseas Regulators Act 2012 (No. 40 of 2012), having consulted with the
heading: 4. Each credit union to which these Regulations apply shall pay a credit
text_raw:
4. Each credit union to which these Regulations apply shall pay a credit 
union levy in respect of the levy period to the Minister for the account of the 
Credit Union Fund at the rate of 0.001484 per cent of the total assets of the 
credit union. 

Payment of levy
text_norm: 4 credit union regulation apply shall pay credit union levy respect levy period minister account credit union fund rate 0.001484 per cent total asset credit union payment levy

title: Overseas Regulators Act 2012 (No. 40 of 2012), having consulted with the
heading: 5. Each credit union to which these Regulations apply that is liable to pay
text_raw:
5. Each credit union to which these Regulations apply that is liable to pay 
the credit union levy under these Regulations shall make such payment to the 
Minister not later than 28 February 2023. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 September, 2022. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance.
